title: [Credit Check]感謝你的支持，是時候跟大家說再見。

replies.msg:
親愛的用戶，
感謝你的支持，是時候跟大家說再見。
我們很高興在過去的日子為您提供由TransUnion支持的免費信貸資料。

Credit Check正式終止服務，我們同大眾市民一樣對個人資料保安重視。
你的用戶的資料將於72小時內永久刪除。

再次忠心感謝你的支持！
如有任何疑問，請聯絡info@CreditCheckApp.hk。 Credit Check
----
Dear Valued User,
Thank you for your support! It’s time to say goodbye.
We are happy to provide the free consumer credit data powered by TransUnion in past months.

Credit Check service is terminated. User’s privacy and data security is our priority. We will delete and remove your data permanently within 72 hours.

Once again, thank you for your support!
For any questions, please contact info@CreditCheckApp.hk.

Credit Check
